meanings.sent1: The mechanic refueled the airplane before its long flight.
meanings.sent2: After the long journey, the car needed to be refueled at the gas station.
meanings.sent3: The hungry car begged to be refueled with gasoline to keep going.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm was refueled by the inspiring words of her mentor.
meanings.sent5: The campfire crackled as it was refueled with more logs.

meanings.definition: To fill up with fuel again
meanings.sent1: The gas station attendant quickly refueled the empty tank of the car.
meanings.sent2: The spaceship had to be refueled before embarking on its next mission.
meanings.sent3: The tired truck sighed in relief as it was refueled with diesel.
meanings.sent4: His determination was refueled by the encouraging words of his coach.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's energy was refueled by a nutritious meal before the race.
